articles.description: Based inside a former lambing shed, this brilliant farm shop has just been officially recognised as the country's best
articles.content:
This is the family-run farm shop that's just been named the best in the UK for its cafe boasting home-made cakes, burgers and mouth-watering breakfasts.
 The Lambing Shed farm shop and cafe in Knuts… [+6759 chars]

articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.title: ‘Causes serious and permanent damage’: Four things to avoid cleaning with white vinegar - Express
articles.description: WHITE vinegar is an effective and cheap household item to use for cleaning. However, this cleaning agent is acidic, which means it can majorly damage some materials. Cleaning experts have identified all the places Britons should avoid using white vinegar arou…

articles.author: Felix Reeves
articles.title: Motorists can save on petrol and diesel costs by driving with a bowl of water - Express
articles.description: PETROL and diesel prices have continually hit all-time record prices in recent days and weeks, but one expert tip could help drivers save on fuel costs.
